content.description: The writer wants to begin the passage by emphasizing the exciting and strange nature of the events discussed in the first paragraph.
content.question: In September 2018, an amazing spectacle took place in the skies above Olympic National Park: blindfolded, sedated mountain goats hovered in the air, suspended in harnesses from a helicopter.Which of the following versions of the underlined text best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: officials from the National Park Service enacted a plan to relocate goats
steps were taken to ensure the safety of visitors to Olympic National Park
the first phase of the Mountain Goat Management Plan began

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
